bean.p:render: @{(document.documentHeader.workflowDocument.initiated or document.documentHeader.workflowDocument.saved or document.documentHeader.workflowDocument.enroute) and (#line.itemTitleId ne null or #line.tempPurchaseOrderIdentifier ne null)}
